in Greek mythology (= ancient stories), the god of water and the sea: The ancients built a beautiful temple to Poseidon. See also
Neptune
More examplesFewer examplesDolphins guided the god of the sea, Poseidon, to his lover Amphitrite.He erected a bronze statue of a dolphin rider on the clifftops, honouring Poseidon, God of the Sea.Poseidon and the other gods decided to punish them, and swallowed the island with a great wave.Athena wears a golden crown and the sea god, Poseidon, has thick, matted hair tinted green.
